articles.author: Brady Thomas
articles.title: Doug Shows tried to royally screw Kentucky at Arkansas: ‘Worst technical foul I’ve ever seen’ - A Sea Of Blue
articles.description: “Doug Shows should never be allowed to officiate another game after that.“
articles.content: The Kentucky Wildcats bounce back on the road at No. 15 Arkansas and capture a much-needed win. The final score came out to 85-77 as the Cats picked up their fifteenth win of the season, and Mark Pop… [+1753 chars]
